member.name: Windows.SHAddDefaultPropertiesByExt
member.summary: Adds default properties to the property store as registered for the specified file extension.
member.param: A pointer to a null-terminated, Unicode string that specifies the extension.
A pointer to the interface that defines the default properties to add.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: Windows.SHCreateDefaultPropertiesOp
member.summary: Creates a file operation that sets the default properties on the Shell item that have not already been set.
member.param: A pointer to the source shell item. See .
The address of the interface pointer.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: Windows.SHResolveFolderPathInLibrary
member.summary: Attempts to resolve the target location of a library folder that has been moved or renamed.
member.param: The object for which to resolve the target location.
The path of the library folder to locate.
The maximum time, in milliseconds, that the method attempts to locate the folder before returning. If the folder could not be located before the specified time elapses, an error is returned.
A pointer to a string that, when this function successfully returns, contains the current path of the library folder specified in plib.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: Windows.SHSetDefaultProperties
member.summary: Applies the default set of properties on a Shell item.
member.param: A handle to the item's parent window, which receives error notifications. This value can be NULL.
A pointer to the object that represents the item.
Flags that customize the operation. See for flag values.
A pointer to an object used to follow the progress of the operation. See for details. This value can be NULL.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
